meanings.definition: A person who studies or collects antiques.
meanings.sent1: The antiquary spent hours examining old coins and pottery.
meanings.sent2: The local antiquary had a vast collection of ancient books.
meanings.sent3: The antiquary found a rare antique mirror at a garage sale.
meanings.sent4: Her grandfather's attic was an antiquary's treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The antiquary's passion for history was evident in every antique piece.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to ancient times or artifacts.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an impressive antiquary vase from Greece.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop specialized in antiquary furniture.
meanings.sent3: The antiquary style of the building gave it a timeless charm.
meanings.sent4: Her love for antiquary jewelry made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The antiquary artifacts told stories of civilizations long gone.
